summary: Diff implements dynamic build/version metadata via getBuildInfo() (no hardcoded '56') and adds runtime /env.json loading + diagnostics/readiness logic that treats missing or empty CANISTER_ID_BACKEND as not configured, with checklist output showing resolved ID or '(not resolved)'. One extra change updates project_state.json tracking entries, which was not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal project tracking file (project_state.json) with new_feature_requests entries/status that are not part of the stated go-live requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only cover build/version metadata and runtime backend canister configuration/diagnostics; it does not request maintaining or modifying a project_state.json file.
